org.soulwing.cdi.properties.converters

Class OptionalPropertyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.cdi.properties.converters.OptionalPropertyConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optional, PropertyConverter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InternetAddressPropertyConverter, ScheduleExpressionPropertyConverter

    public abstract class OptionalPropertyConverter
extends Object
implements Optional
    An abstract base for property converters that depend on classes or other resources that may not be present at runtime.
    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        public final boolean isAvailable()
        Tests whether this provider is available.

        This method will be invoked once after the component is instantiated via its constructor. If the return value is false no subsequent method invocations will occur on the provider instance.

        Specified by:
        isAvailable in interface Optional
        Returns:
        true if the provider is should be considered available

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • convert

        public final Object convert(String value,
             PropertyConverter.Context context)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the given string representation of a property value to an instance of the underlying type supported by this converter.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface PropertyConverter
        Parameters:

        context - conversion context
        Returns:
        a representation of value as type T
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is a syntactically invalid string representation for type

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the name for this property converter.

        The Property qualifier allows a named converter to be specified.
